user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill the need for comfortable, reliable, and discreet underwear that I could wear throughout the day without discomfort.
purchase_reason: I was looking for comfortable underwear that would provide all-day wearability. The product's description highlighted its softness and durability, which appealed to my need for comfort and reliability. The tag-free feature and 100% cotton liner were also significant factors that influenced my decision, as I prioritize comfort in my daily wear.

I needed breathable underwear that would not show under my clothes. The description emphasized the soft, breathable fabric and the no-show design, which aligned perfectly with my requirements for comfort and discretion. The added feature of X-Temp cooling was a bonus that made me feel confident in my choice.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that offer exceptional comfort and a good fit. I value soft materials that feel pleasant against the skin, as well as features that enhance usability, such as breathable fabrics and tag-free designs. I appreciate items that are versatile and can be worn in various settings, whether for lounging or active use. Additionally, I tend to favor products that come in attractive colors or styles, as this adds to my overall satisfaction. On the other hand, I dislike items that are poorly sized, flimsy, or lack durability, as these factors detract from the comfort and usability I seek.

conversation.content: I want comfortable, reliable, and discreet underwear for all-day wear. within my expected price range: [10.47, 15.97]
What style or design do you prefer for your underwear?

I prefer underwear that offers exceptional comfort and a good fit. Soft materials and breathable fabrics are important to me, as well as features like tag-free designs. Versatility in wearing options and attractive colors or styles also enhance my satisfaction.
What fabric types do you prefer for your underwear, such as cotton, modal, microfiber, or others?
I prefer underwear made of cotton for its softness and breathability.

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's Sporty Cotton Assorted Boyshort Underwear> / Item ID: B0BB767B8M / Price: $10.49 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["The Hanes Women's Cotton Boyshort Underwear come in a convenient pack of 6 pairs. They offer it all-comfort, fit and style. You'll also love features like the breathable ultra soft ring spun cotton and an ultra soft, plush back waistband that won't pinch or bind and no-ride-up leg bands that stay in place. Plus, tag-free label means freedom from annoying, scratchy tags. Designed with excellent coverage, these panties come in an assorted color pack, colors may be different than shown in the image. The boyshort style provides full coverage front and back.. Don't compromise on comfort, style and fit, when you can have all three with the Hanes Women's Cotton Boyshort Underwear."] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's Sporty Cotton Hipster Underwear> / Item ID: B08YFLPPDM / Price: $14.18 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["The Hanes Women's Sporty Cotton Hipster Underwear offer it all-comfort, fit and style. You'll also love features the ultra soft waistband that won't pinch or bind. Plus, tag-free label means freedom from annoying, scratchy tags. Made from ultra soft, breathable ring-spun cotton these panties will keep you feeling fresh all day with Cool Comfort wicking technology. These panties come in an assorted color pack, colors may be different than shown in the image. Don't compromise on comfort, style and fit, when you can have all three with the Hanes Women's Sporty Cotton Assorted Hipster Underwear."] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Bali Women's Comfort Revolution Seamless Hi-Cut> / Item ID: B08YXC41MD / Price: $8.66 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ['A no-ride-up design, Bali® women’s Comfort Revolution® hi-cut panty is made for the woman on-the-go. Designed with Cool Comfort® moisture-wicking nylon fabric, this women’s panty will keep you comfortable all-day long. The high-cut, seamless panty features a tag-free design that won’t chafe or dig. Narrow leg bands and a knit-in waistband help minimize panty lines for a smooth finish. A classic high-rise design, Bali® seamless women’s underwear offers full front and back coverage so you can move with confidence.']
